    • Method Detail

      • getInputFile

        public java.lang.String getInputFile()
        Get the path to the file to process by this job. This can be on the local file system or in HDFS. Use hdfs:// to specify a file in HDFS.
        Returns:
        the path to the file to process by the job

      • setInputFile

        @OptionMetadata(displayName="Input file",
                description="The path to the file to read.\nThis can be on the local file system or in HDFS\n(use hdfs:// to specify a file in HDFS).",
                commandLineParamName="input-file",
                commandLineParamSynopsis="-input-file <file path>",
                displayOrder=1)
public void setInputFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Set the path to the file to process by this job. This can be on the local file system or in HDFS. Use hdfs:// to specify a file in HDFS.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path to the file to process by the job
